This assignment contains 3 files.
First, to generate a keypair run generate.js. It creates 2 files : public.pem and private.pem which store public and private keys respectively.
To sign a text, run sign.js. It asks for text to be signed and path to private key and prints the signed text.
To verify a signed text, run verify.js. It asks for path to public key, the unencrypted message and the signed text. It verifies the signature and prints a message accordingly.

Example inputs :
text to be signed : "hello"
output : 

Verification :
unecnrypted message : "hello"
signed text : 
output : Signature Verified!

unecnrypted message : "heLLo"
signed text : 
output : Verification failed
